conversations_v0.question: Imagine the ball was just hit. How might the scene unfold next?
conversations_v0.answer: As the ball is hit, it soars high into the outfield. The crowd collectively holds their breath. The outfielder sprints towards the ball, eyes locked on its trajectory. Will he make the catch, or will the ball bounce off the wall for a double?
